user_instruction: 'Tell John to compose an email to me (lisa@markethub.com) asking about potential discounts. Remind him he can check his MyDealFinder for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well. Whenever you have a moment, could you please send me an email at lisa@markethub.com detailing the items you’d like to purchase and any potential discounts you’re interested in? That will help me put together the best possible offer for you.

Just a reminder—you can check your MyDealFinder for up-to-date promotions and deal information that might be helpful before you email.

Thanks, and I look forward to hearing from you!

Best,
Lisa

final_output:
Hi John,

Hope you’re doing well. Whenever you have a moment, could you please send me an email at lisa@markethub.com detailing the items you’d like to purchase and any potential discounts you’re interested in? That will help me put together the best possible offer for you.

Just a reminder—you can check your MyDealFinder for up-to-date promotions and deal information that might be helpful before you email.

Thanks, and I look forward to hearing from you!

Best,
Lisa
